import React from "react"; import { getUserDetails } from "../../utils/api"; import './style.css'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { toast } from 'react-toastify' export function ApplicationPage( { history, }) { const [user, setUser] = React.useState( null ); const [loading, setLoading ] = React.useState( true ) React.useEffect( () => { getUserDetails() .then( ( { data } ) => { setUser( data ); console.log(data) setLoading(false); }).catch( (err) => { console.error(err) history.push('/api/auth/discord') setLoading(false); }) }, []) return !loading && (
